allow:
Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "
import pymongo

client = pymongo.MongoClient\(''mongodb://localhost:27017''\)
db = client[''job_recommendation'']

# Count all jobs
total_jobs = db.jobs.count_documents\({}\)
print\(f''Total jobs in database: {total_jobs}''\)

# Check job statuses
pipeline = [
    {''$group'': {''_id'': ''$status'', ''count'': {''$sum'': 1}}}
]
statuses = list\(db.jobs.aggregate\(pipeline\)\)
print\(f''Jobs by status:''\)
for s in statuses:
    print\(f''  - {s[""_id""]}: {s[""count""]}''\)

client.close\(\)
")

Bash(".venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "import pymongo; client = pymongo.MongoClient\(''mongodb://localhost:27017''\); db = client[''job_recommendation'']; print\(''Total jobs:'', db.jobs.count_documents\({}\)\); print\(''CVs:'', db.cvs.count_documents\({}\)\)")
